Description

Seabrook Studios is an independent studio based in Melbourne, Australia. Our current focus is to making sports-themed games more accessible to people; not just those with great reaction skills.

History

Seabrook Studios is the creative outlet of Ryan Boucher. Their first board game, 18 Holes, successfully funded on Kickstarter in April 2020. Their first digital game, Victory Lap, is in early access.

Projects

  • 18 Holes
  • Victory Lap
